name: caracas
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Venezuela, in the northern part of the country: He ran a dental practice in Caracas during the 1960s and 1970s. For his thesis he worked on a low-income construction project in a poor Caracas barrio.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Caracas the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Caracas.Chávez then left Caracas for Lima to take part in a summit with nearly 60 leaders and top officials from Latin America.
